roleset.name: acquire (forcefully or stealthily)

example.name: basic transitive
example.text: To keep program-trading units profitable in the eyes of senior brokerage executives, traders must seize every opportunity their computers find.
example.arg: To keep program-trading units profitable in the eyes of senior brokerage executives

example.name: PP variant
example.text: There has been no announcement of the Burger King arrangement by either party, possibly for fear that McDonald's and other fast-food rivals would seize on it in scornful advertising.

example.name: with
example.text: John seized a dozen cookies out of Mary's hands.
